Methods

GetUserDiscordMember(DiscordGuild)

Tries to return a DSharpPlus.Entities.DiscordMember representing the user in the specified server. If the user is not found, returns null.

internal DiscordMember GetUserDiscordMember(DiscordGuild discordGuild)

Parameters

discordGuild DiscordGuild

The Discord guild where the user is expected to be a member.

Returns

DiscordMember

Returns DSharpPlus.Entities.DiscordMember if found; otherwise, returns null.
